meanings.sent1: The teacher pointed out the incorrectness in my math homework.
meanings.sent2: Her essay was full of incorrectness, with many spelling errors.
meanings.sent3: Despite the incorrectness of the situation, we all had a good laugh.
meanings.sent4: The incorrectness of his statement was like a dark cloud hanging over the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The incorrectness of the map led us on a wild goose chase through the forest.

meanings.definition: The state or quality of being wrong or mistaken.
meanings.sent1: He admitted the incorrectness of his decision to skip the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The incorrectness of the address on the package caused it to be delivered to the wrong house.
meanings.sent3: The incorrectness of the weather forecast left us unprepared for the sudden storm.
meanings.sent4: The incorrectness of her assumptions about the project led to its failure.
meanings.sent5: The incorrectness of his accusation caused a rift in their friendship.
